frontmatter.title: Animal recognition with Siamese Networks and Mean Embeddings
frontmatter.description: Is Siamese Network a reliable solution for animal recognition? How Mean Embeddings can help with a few shot "learning"? Are we able to beat standard classification methods?

frontmatter.title: Understanding Region of Interest - Part 2 (RoI Align)
frontmatter.description: A visual explanation of how RoI Align works and why is it better than standard RoI Pooling?

frontmatter.title: Understanding Region of Interest (RoI Pooling)
frontmatter.description: Quick and easy explanation what is RoI Pooling and how it works? Why do we event using it in Fast R-CNNs? Can we use sth better instead?
